lead_paragraph: The Penn Relays, the oldest and largest track and field carnival of its kind, began at Franklin Field in Philadelphia yesterday with 19,000 athletes from 260 colleges, 975 high schools and 100 clubs competing. With a crowd of 23,996 watching on a chilly day, the distance medleys were won by Tennessee among college women (11 minutes 9.16 seconds) and Southern Regional of Manahawkin, N.J., among high school girls (11:45.54).
